document_data.name: Illinge Hardraw
document_data.deathnotes: slain by [[Belmer]] on [[Eleasis 4]], [[Night of Fourteen Magisters]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Illinge Hardraw''' was an apprentice to [[Zunroun Ilber]] in the early 8{{th}} century [[DR]]. He killed his master on the [[Night of Fourteen Magisters]], but did not survive him for very long.
document_data.History: On the [[Night of Fourteen Magisters]] of [[Eleasis 4]], {{yearlink|709}}, he slew his master after the latter became [[Magister]], before he regained consciousness from his [[spell]] to bind his own clones to his command. He became Magister, but while he gloated, he was scried on by [[Belmer]] of the Six Thunders, who slew him with a spell.
